item.title: Rudolf Dupszki versus Yixin
item.description: This article is a summary of the 2-game match between Yixin and Rudolf Dupszki in Gomoku World Championship 2017. The final result of Yixin is 2 win.
item.dc:creator: Kai Sun

item.title: Lin Shu-Hsuan versus Yixin
item.description: This article is a summary of the 4-game match between Yixin and Lin Shu-Hsuan. The final result of Yixin is 3 win and 1 loss.
item.dc:creator: Kai Sun

item.title: Yixin in the Final of the Russian Championship 2017
item.description: This article is a summary of 3 games between Yixin and Nikonov Konstantin, and 1 game between Yixin and Makarov Pavel. The final result of Yixin is 4 win.
item.dc:creator: Kai Sun

item.title: Epifanov Dmitry versus Yixin
item.description: This article is a summary of the 8-game match between Yixin and Epifanov Dmitry. The final result of Yixin is 2 win, 2 draw, and 4 loss.
item.dc:creator: Kai Sun

item.title: QTRC 2016（第三场）中的人机对弈
item.description: 在QTRC 2016（第三场）最后一日冠军确定后，冠军与Yixin进行了两场对弈。
item.dc:creator: Kai Sun
